trans-unit.source: Specifies how reliable collections will lock resources, which determines how the resources can be accessed by concurrent transactions.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how reliable collections will lock resources, which determines how the resources can be accessed by concurrent transactions.

trans-unit.source: Use the default lock mode based on the operation and isolation level of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Use the default lock mode based on the operation and isolation level of the transaction.

trans-unit.source: Used on resources that can be updated.
trans-unit.target: Used on resources that can be updated.

trans-unit.source: Prevents a common form of deadlock that occurs when multiple transactions are reading, locking, and potentially updating resources later.
trans-unit.target: Prevents a common form of deadlock that occurs when multiple transactions are reading, locking, and potentially updating resources later.
